title: Haunted House
description: Dress the house up for Halloween and express your creativity.
completion_text: It's Halloween Night! Change the colours at the top of the code to make this into a night scene then express your creativity by combining previous challenges with it or causing mischief, some ideas to get you started are in the comments.
code:
#Colors, that need to be made spookier
sky = aqua
ground = green
sun = yellow
bricks = brown
roof = red
frames = gray
windows = blue
door = setBrightness(brown,-40)

#Sky
background sky
stroke 0
moveTo 100, 100
color sun
circle 60
#Why not add some spooky clouds or bats

#Ground
moveTo 250,530
color ground
ellipse 500,150

#House
moveTo 100,180
color bricks
rectangle 300,270

#Windows
#Cause some mischief, can you figure out how to throw eggs on all the windows in just 3 lines of code
drawWindow = (x,y) ->
    color setBrightness(frames,30)
    moveTo x,y
    rectangle 60,80
    color windows
    moveTo x+5,y+5
    rectangle 50,70
    color setBrightness(frames,30)
    moveTo x, y+37.5
    rectangle 60,5
    moveTo x+27.5, y
    rectangle 5,80
drawWindow(120,200)
drawWindow(220,200)
drawWindow(120,310)
drawWindow(320,200)
drawWindow(320,310)

#Roof
color roof
moveTo 100, 180
polygon 150, -100, 300, 0
#You could use the arc function to cover the roof in toilet paper 


#Door
color setBrightness(frames,-10)
moveTo 215, 330
rectangle 70,110
move 5,5
color door
rectangle 60,105
color setBrightness(frames,-40) 
move -15,105
rectangle 90,20
move 65,-50
color setBrightness(door,80)
circle 3
#How about putting a pumpkin beside the door
